the release date for hare and loathing in la vega be the same as the release date for attack of the drone
resp:
Here are the steps to determine whether the claim is TRUE or FALSE:

1. Look at the table and identify the row for "Hare and Loathing in Las Vegas".
   - Relevant cells: ["title", "series", "director", "characters", "release date"] with values ["Hare and Loathing in Las Vegas", "lt", "Bill Kopp, Peter Shin", "bugs, sam", "2004 - 03 - 31"]

2. Look at the table and identify the row for "Attack of the Drones".
   - Relevant cells: ["title", "series", "director", "characters", "release date"] with values ["Attack of the Drones", "lt", "Rich Moore", "daffy (as duck dodgers)", "2004 - 03 - 31"]

3. Compare the release dates for "Hare and Loathing in Las Vegas" and "Attack of the Drones".
   - Both have a release date of "2004 - 03 - 31".

Based on this comparison, we can conclude that the claim is TRUE.
